Frank Rosenthal

Science for the People with Nafis Hasan and Frank Rosenthal

16 May 2020

Dan interviews Frank Rosenthal on the history of the radical science organization Science for the People and Nafis Hasan on everything about a left-wing politics of science. Subscribe to Science for the People at magazine.ScienceForThePeople.org...
